original_text: They looked for a way to arrest him, but they were afraid of the crowd because the people held that he was a prophet.
korean_text: 잡고자 하나 무리를 무서워하니 이는 그들이 예수를 선지자로 앎이었더라

sentences.original_text: They looked for a way to arrest him
but they were afraid of the crowd
because the people held that he was a prophet
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 사람들은 그가 선지자라고 생각했기 때문이다
